level.introtext: We're almost there just a few more things. Make sure you check conditions!
level.code:
as you saw earlier, while loops can imitate for loops i = 0 text = "1" while (i < 5): text += "0" i+=1
You have to make sure your loop stops at some point or your program will run forever.
The code below is correct. The code below has an INFINITE LOOP!
i = 0; while (0 < 5): i+=1
